schema:creator: Long, J.D.
schema:description: Constructed of adobe brick; For details see trip report no. 17. ([a](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1823a)) From railroad embankment. Note partially completed patio wall, swimming pool in patio and solar heater over kitchen porch at right. ([b](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1823b)) Kitchen porch  - note solar heater and false flue containing tank, ([c](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1823c)) From front - note water supply tank at extreme hilltop in right background. ([d](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1823d)) A.B. McIntyre stuccoing patio wall and his brother. They have patented machine to manufacture adobe blocks. Note concrete foundation and coping, ([e](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1823e)) Corner of patio wall and garage - note lime mortar joints groove in blocks for plaster bond and method of forming arch.
schema:keywords: .1 Materials, manufacture, tests, strength, preservation, etc.
schema:name: Residence, Roy Baker Ranch, Saugus, Los Angeles County (c)
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
schema:sdPublisher: UC Davis, Archives and Special Collections
